DOC.brief_summary: Eprotirome ( KB2115 ) liver selective thyroid hormone induce hyperthyroidism liver , euthyroid state preserve extrahepatic tissue . Eprotirome clinical trial demonstrate pronounced reduction several independent risk factor development atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease . The purpose study assess efficacy safety KB2115 add therapy ezetimibe follow 10 week exposure compare placebo . The aim study ass efficacy ( LDL-cholesterol lower effect ) safety KB2115 define clinically relevant dose dose range future study .
DOC.brief_title: LDL-Cholesterol Lowering Effect KB2115 Add Ezetimibe
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 75 year Patient primary hypercholesterolemia LDLcholesterol > 3.0 mmol/L At randomization , diet instruct investigator last 4 week prior randomization willingness follow instruction throughout study History somatic psychiatric disease/condition , may interfere objective study
